## solana package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Deployer](./solana.deployer.md) | Deploy new programs |
|  [NFTCollection](./solana.nftcollection.md) | A collection of associated NFTs |
|  [NFTDrop](./solana.nftdrop.md) | A collection of NFTs that can be lazy minted and claimed |
|  [Program](./solana.program.md) | Dynamic interface for interacting with Solana programs. |
|  [ThirdwebSDK](./solana.thirdwebsdk.md) | The main entry-point for the thirdweb Solana SDK. |
|  [Token](./solana.token.md) | Standard token or cryptocurrency. |
|  [UserWallet](./solana.userwallet.md) | Handle and view info about the wallet connected to the SDK. |

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
